subject: Attention Beneficiary
body:
Attention Beneficiary
This letter is to change your life from today. I am Dr. Usman
Shamsudeen the Director, International Remittance Department of the
central bank of Nigeria (CBN), my Boss, Mr. Godwin Emefiele the
Governor of the Central bank of Nigeria is presently on suspension by
the new administration and all power have been vested on me to make
all international payments transfer. Also, due to reported cases of
corrupt practices in other Nigeria Banks, the Federal Government has
revoked/cancelled all power vested on those Banks and have appointed
only the central bank of Nigeria to make all over due foreign contract
payments transfer.
Your payment has been in this bank for many years unclaimed because my
boss Mr. Godwin Emefiele have refused to tell you the truth on how to
claim your fund this is because he has been using the interest
accumulated from your fund every year to enrich himself without your
knowledge. I want to help you pull out this fund to your bank account
using the easiest and quickest method, which have not been made known
to you before.
by this method, your fund will be transferred directly to your
nominated bank account within 5hours the same day. No Cost of Transfer
(COT) and no stoppage from any Government departments as the transfer
will be done within this bank alone and it is very safe.
The method which was introduced to you before is the Telegraphic
Transfer (TT) for which confirmation is 48hrs,because of the time
factor, petitions could come from various organizations stopping your
payment and asking you to pay huge fee which would be difficult for
you to pay so that they can benefit from the huge interest your fund
generates while still in the Bank. This method is not safe for you
because it is not done within the bank alone as information of the
payment would be sent to the Central Control Unit (CCU) of the Federal
Ministry of Finance and office of the Accountant General of the
Federation. As a good Christian, I have nothing to gain by keeping
your fund, I want to help you get your fund out as soon as possible
before the governor of the central bank will resume office.
You have to follow up and work with me now, and keep this very
confidential because of fraudsters and impostors who goes about
presenting various bank accounts in order to divert another
beneficiary's fund.
You don't need to pay any fee to me before i will transfer your funds
to your account, but all you need to do is to open a domiciliary
account with us where your payment will first of all be lodged inn for
further credit to your account.
You also need to assure me that, as soon as you confirm your funds in
your account, you are going to compensate me. Please, quickly
re-confirm your account details to me as soon as possible, and for
security reasons, we can only communicate through E-mail for now.
Yours Truly,
Dr. Usman Shamsudeen

subject: Re:   Attention Beneficiary
body:
Hello Dr. Usman Shamsudeen,

Thank you for your message. It's quite intriguing to hear about the situation at the Central Bank of Nigeria. I must say, it sounds like a lot of responsibility has been placed on your shoulders.

I'm curious about this method you mentioned that will allow the fund to be transferred directly to my nominated bank account within the same day. Could you please elaborate more on how this process works? 

Also, when you mention opening an account with your bank, could you provide more details about this? What kind of account would it be and what are the requirements for opening such an account?

Lastly, I'd like to know more about how I can assure you that I will compensate you once I confirm the funds in my account. What kind of compensation are you expecting?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Diana
